sentences.en: Everything was ruddy, shadowy, and indistinct to her.
sentences.cn: 每样东西, 在她看来都泛着红光, 显得阴暗而模糊.

sentences.en: He had a naturally ruddy complexion.
He took the paraffin stove on a picnic and the ruddy thing wouldn't work.
sentences.cn: 他带了那个煤油炉去野餐，但是那个该死的东西根本用不了。

sentences.en: He was too buoyant, too full of ruddy life, too assured.
sentences.cn: 他太轻浮快活, 太爱寻欢作乐, 又太自信了.

sentences.en: Her black hair springs in fine strands across her tawny, ruddy cheek.
sentences.cn: 她的一头乌发分披在健康红润的脸颊旁.

sentences.en: His face is still ruddy and handsome.
His ruddy face still routinely creases with mirth.
sentences.cn: 他红润的脸庞仍旧时常笑得堆起褶子。

sentences.en: I can't get the ruddy car to start!
sentences.cn: 我就是发动不了这破车！

sentences.en: That hunter has a ruddy face because he is outdoors so much.
sentences.cn: 那个猎人脸色红润,因为他长期待在户外.

sentences.en: That young man has a ruddy face.
The face was strong, big - boned and ruddy.
sentences.cn: 脸是结实红润的, 颧骨高高的.

sentences.en: The hot tear was often in his magnanimous ruddy - brown eye.
sentences.cn: 他那双豪爽的 红褐色 眼睛里,不是也常常热泪盈眶么?

sentences.en: What the ruddy hell are you doing?
You'd ruddy well better do it.

trans.tran_cn: 红润的，血色好的，〈俚〉可恶的
trans.tran_en: a ruddy face looks pink and healthy
